tweet: ICYMI: On December 6th, we’ll be changing the k-parameter as part of our ongoing commitment to #Cardano decentralization, opening up further opportunities for stake pool growth.  As an #ADA delegator or SPO, here’s what you need to know  @cardano  https://t.co/TRGMoRR9ht

Those who buy high and sell low are the profit source for those that buy low and sell high. Prices jumping up and down speeds up that wealth transfer.  #Bitcoin #Etheruem #XRP #BitcoinCash #BitcoinSV #Litecoin #EOS #BNB #tezos #XLM #Cardano #chainlink #monero #Tron #HEX #BTC #ETH
SNet/ Cardano online event on Monday -- where I'll announce a new DeFi initiative and talk about some new COVID-19 simulation results....

$ADA #CARDANO  On higher timeframe support as it fully retraced its recent push.  Might be seeing some further momentum towards 800-850 sats if the market doesn't act strange.  https://t.co/YH6HMtmTQB

The main difference between #PoW and #PoS is in holding the consensual power. In PoW, only miners have the power. In PoS, for example in the case of #Cardano, all $ADA holders have a part of consensual power. Thus they are regularly rewarded with new coins. It is called #staking.  https://t.co/NmLIBdwfT7

It is difficult to create a #blockchain that is able to run over 10 years without significant change. There is one disadvantage, though. The software can get old. #Cardano is built as a mission-critical project. It will run for tens of years and it will be possible to upgrade it.  https://t.co/eyvKssEfp4
